title: The Beatitudes: Poor in Spirit
description:
Readings from:

Matthew 5:1-3

Psalm 51:17

Isaiah 57:15

James 2:1-5

Today's passages were read by Nick Rynerson, chief creative officer at an agency in Bloomington, IL.
